resources.string:
This is Extras for AA, a theme to change Android Auto Look 

If you want to thank me for the development and the effort, you could make a donation with the button down below. 
Even a small amount would be much appreciated ðŸ˜Š
Many thanks for the wallpapers go to: %1$s
It seems like you are not running Substratum Lite.\n In order to apply Extras for AA, please install Substratum Lite.

To install:
 1. Tick Android Auto and select an extra from list
 2. See attention mark near "Android Auto" to avoid errors 3. Select one or more extras from list 4. Hit the bottom button and select Build & Install
 5. Repeat steps 3 and 4 as many times as you want 6. Reboot, go to manager tab, select the built overlay(s) and enable

Heya! If you are here, that\'s because you don\'t have Substratum Installed. Extras for AA is a theme and needs Substratum to work, it\'s not a stand-alone app. Please install Substratum and try again.
Hey, would you take a moment to rate this theme on XDA Labs?
You seem to really enjoy Extras for AA, would you like to show appreciation with a donation?
